ConfirmEmailPage.title: Email Confirmation

ServerListPage.notAuthorized: You are not authorized. To start playing,

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Looks like this page doesn’t exist

ResetPasswordPage.title: Password Recovery
ResetPasswordPage.alreadySent: A code has already been sent. Please enter the code from the email, or request a new one in 15 minutes
ResetPasswordPage.codeExpired: The code has expired. Please request a new one
ResetPasswordPage.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again
ResetPasswordPage.passwordTooShort: The password is too simple. Use more characters
ResetPasswordPage.passwordTooLong: The password is too long. Use fewer characters
ResetPasswordPage.stepEmailText: Enter the email of your account. We’ll send a verification code to it, and once you enter it, you’ll be able to set a new password
ResetPasswordPage.stepCodeText: Check your inbox at {email} and enter the code you received in the email
ResetPasswordPage.stepPasswordText: Create and enter a new password
